mapper.select: select count(1) from bt_person where email = #{email};
select p.id, p.surname, p.firstname, p.email, p.phone, p.password, p.token from bt_person as p where p.email = #{email};
select p.id, p.surname, p.firstname, p.email, p.phone, p.password, p.token from bt_person as p where p.id = #{id};
mapper.insert: insert into bt_person (surname, firstname, email, phone, p.password, p.token) VALUE (#{name}, #{firstname}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{password}, #{token});
mapper.select: select p.id, p.surname, p.firstname, p.email, p.phone, p.password, p.token from bt_farmer as f join bt_person p on p.id = f.id where p.id = #{id};
select p.id, p.surname, p.firstname, p.email, p.phone, p.password, p.token from bt_helper as h join bt_person p on p.id = h.id where p.id = #{id};
mapper.update: update person SET p.surname = #{name}, p.firstname = #{firstname}, p.email = #{email}, p.phone = #{phone}, p.password = #{password}, p.token = #{token} from bt_helper as h join bt_person p on p.id = h.id where p.id = #{id};
